description: The border counties of Donegal, Cavan and Monaghan move to the second highest level of restrictions.
title: Coronavirus: Ireland to bring in ban on household visits
title_page: Coronavirus: Ireland to bring in ban on household visits - BBC News
maintext: "The implications for local hospitals and public health in these areas is obvious and very serious, so too is the need for immediate escalation in restrictions in those three counties," he said.
